app.name: ColGREP
app.one_liner: Semantic code search for your terminal and coding agents that combines regex filtering with semantic ranking, all running locally.

screens.name: Main Terminal Interface
screens.purpose: Allow users to perform semantic+regex code searches directly in the terminal after initializing a project index.
primary_actions: Automatically update index on file changes

rust_commands.name: init
rust_commands.purpose: Builds the initial semantic index for a specified project directory or current working directory.

rust_commands.name: install_claude_code
rust_commands.purpose: Installs ColGREP integration for Claude Code plugin.

rust_commands.name: install_codex
rust_commands.purpose: Installs ColGREP integration for Codex plugin.

rust_commands.name: install_opencode
rust_commands.purpose: Installs ColGREP integration for OpenCode plugin.

rust_commands.name: search
rust_commands.purpose: Performs combined regex and semantic search on indexed codebase, updating index if files changed.

mvp_plan: week 1: Build file change detection and incremental reindexing
week 1: Implement core indexing logic using ONNX-based semantic model
week 1: Integrate regex preprocessing with BRE-to-ERE conversion
week 1: Package as single Rust binary with no external dependencies
acceptance_tests: ColGREP must handle files opened elsewhere without erroring out during indexing or search.
ColGREP must successfully index a project on Apple Silicon macOS without crashing (exit code 101).
Running `colgrep init` inside a hidden directory must correctly index all eligible files.
Unbalanced group escapes in regex input must not produce invalid ERE during query processing.
